Reviews.Title: “Could do much better”
Reviews.Author: bennett_admin
Reviews.Content: previous trips france get 3am get connecting flight amsterdam last trip flew early evening arrived amsterdam 7pm checked mercure little 8 comfortable well equipped room got great nights sleep ready flight back usa next morning important know room 12 13 hours check 8pm 9am plus already airport checked bags stay checked staff efficient helpful food beverages available airport rooms soundproof air conditioned elegant certainly comfortable practical rooms book quickly must paid advance planning stay next trip

Reviews.Title: “Ok hotel for ok price”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: booked hotel website unfortunately due circumstances could go anymore let hotel know 6 days advance could costs could chance sell room straight away got message hotel saying would reception assume easy room someone else end room another guest charged euros disgusting

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant hotel but unattractive area”
Reviews.Author: Ed_Paul
Reviews.Content: rooms quite place city near lake long walks food breakfast mediocre good place business purposes staff friendly helpful

Reviews.Title: “Really good hotel, good price, good quality, good location.”
Reviews.Author: MoshUk
Reviews.Content: great hotel one night stopover amsterdam free shuttle hotel airport cute barrestaurant comfortable rooms

Reviews.Title: “Convenient budget hotel”
Reviews.Author: olegkravitz
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel one night closer airport interiors needs refurbishment room smelly lift small considering size hotel always took stairs free use reception ate outside cant comment hotel restaurant shuttle service good time though far city centre hotel two buses routes connecting city centre

Reviews.Title: “Definitely not what it's made out to be.....!!”
Reviews.Author: Sarah2394
Reviews.Content: husband enjoyed three night stay hotel part coach trip others arrived ten evening tired reception staff us checked quickly room within minutes bed comfortable room fine needed clean although little small complaints breakfast good lots choices bacon eggs beans ham cheese yogurts cereals fruits coffee table although last morning non due machine broken dont know water could boiled reason non morning

Reviews.Title: “Very good value for money”
Reviews.Author: ayis
Reviews.Content: disappointed spite fact already paid reservation reception card money guarantee isnt unlocked till week

Reviews.Title: “decent location, dont miss the bernabeu!!!”
Reviews.Author: jonsey_uk
Reviews.Content: early flight amsterdam wanted stay close airport hotel 5 min airport location perfect price seemed ok check area bar restaurant quite new nice pretty terrace overlooking lifts seem rooms smallish clean well appointed shower pretty low cramped arrived around 11pm looking food choice pretty terrible pizza worst kind breakfast also pretty low quality buffet certainly well standard rest hotel staff quite friendly professional looking decent sleep flight hotel delivered food improved would even ok hotel base amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel in interesting neighborhood.”
Reviews.Author: JudyMrr
Reviews.Content: travel lot member sofitel group usually travel around world using sofitel ibis mercure travel around europe us travel least 3 times year hotel simply poor horrible rooms ridiculous small dirty service absolutely receptionist speaks bad poor english location far away airport city catch bus 5 minutes walking hotel absolutely didnt like price 2 stars hotel shouldnt 50 euros day due distance place free internet free parking pay internet fake absolutely slow expensive place looks like hold remodeled hotel simply ridiculous

Reviews.Title: “Not really an aparthotel”
Reviews.Author: Bicholisto
Reviews.Content: easy move airport hotel hop waiting car nice easy long weekend like hotel ok nothing fancy clean quiet good breakfast area improve way next flight wanting stay night attitude brilliant didnt want pay much hotel yet wanted nice room junior suite perfect choise want needed hotel middle nowhere take taxi quick bus centre amsterdam hotel actually good choise absolutely nothing hotel stayed hotel nights bus goes 15 minutes centre would come back yes

Reviews.Title: “Decent but could be cleaner”
Reviews.Author: basak83
Reviews.Content: clean nice rooms quiet shuttle bus airport good value money didnt eat restaurant looked ok first time ive pay local taxes prepaid though

Reviews.Title: “Great value in a safe, quiet location close to Metro”
Reviews.Author: dinojo
Reviews.Content: poor old hotel rooms ugly dirty impossible hotel correct isnt 4 star hotel maybe 2 star

Reviews.Title: “good budget hotel between airport and centre”
Reviews.Author: thefrancophile
Reviews.Content: good stay great breakfast wifi bit useless apart good

Reviews.Title: “Practical hotel with good location”
Reviews.Author: mumucienta
Reviews.Content: hotel part deal new year amsterdam given airport hotel reservations would base explore city need worried hotel actually airport could hear traffic noise also wondered easy would get city fine caught bus close hotel always ran exactly time thing lacking tea coffee making facilities room continental breakfast excellent choice buffet style service

Reviews.Title: “Okay, but out of the way”
Reviews.Author: I-Hate-Carolina
Reviews.Content: stayed flight cancelled restaurant good bit pricey rooms good took full advantage free shuttle bus running airport due shops etc nearby however get everything airport needs clear signs lift seems almost hidden also larger lift might good suggestion overall nice stay
